templateHistory.lhs:
${#usedname:=item.name}$

Rolling to hit with ${!usedname}$:
${[1d20] + floor( (compareText(item.kind, string('Physical')) != 0 ? SAtk / 10 : ATK / 10 ) + accuracy + (item.modifier))}$

Rolling w/ ${!compareText(advantagecheck, string('kh')) != 0 ? "Disadvantage" : "Advantage"}$ to hit using ${!item.name}$:
${[2d20:advantagecheck:] + floor( (compareText(item.kind, string('Physical')) != 0 ? SAtk / 10 : ATK / 10 ) + accuracy + (item.modifier))}$

Rolling Body save w/ ${!compareText(advantagecheck, string('kh')) != 0 ? "Disadvantage" : "Advantage"}$: 

${[2d20:advantagecheck:] + bodysave}$

Rolling Reflex save w/ ${!compareText(advantagecheck, string('kh')) != 0 ? "Disadvantage" : "Advantage"}$: 

${[2d20:advantagecheck:] + reflexsave}$

Rolling Mind save w/ ${!compareText(advantagecheck, string('kh')) != 0 ? "Disadvantage" : "Advantage"}$: 

${[2d20:advantagecheck:] + mindsave}$
